channel.title: Web scraping on Devashree Madhugiri
channel.description: Recent content in Web scraping on Devashree Madhugiri

item.title: Web scraping with PyScrappy 🖥️
item.description: Finding good datasets for practice are challenging to find. Although, there are several types of datasets available online, but it is exciting to build a dataset using the web scraping technique. For this, one needs to have some experience in writing scraping code. However, there are some libraries which allow the users to scrape the required data from different websites with minimal code and no expertise. In this article, I explore one such web scraping library called “PyScrappy” and few of its different web scraping modules.

item.title: How To Use Python To Analyse Fitness Tracker Market: Step By Step EDA 📈📊
item.description: Fitness wearables are a trend today. With various players in the market offering trackers and smartwatches for the fitness concious individuals, it is interesting to explore the wide array of products in this market based on their features, prices, reviews and ratings.In this project, we analyze the fitness trackers' market in India using Python. First we scrape the required data and later visualize it to generate interesting insights about the current situation of the market.
